nodes.text: The Imperial Sergeant Kreel wielded a lightsaber during the Galactic Civil War.
The Jedi who originally owned the lightsaber died with the saber in their hand.

Kreel, when he posed as the gamemaster, took the lightsaber from Grakkus the Hutt's Jedi artifacts collection. He used the weapon when training the rebel Luke Skywalker for Grakkus' arena games. After his assignment on Nar Shaddaa, Kreel chose to become sergeant of Task Force 99 and used his lightsaber during a skirmish against rebel forces on the Ghost Moon. Kreel later used the lightsaber in combat against Skywalker again whilst aboard the Harbinger during the Siege on Tureen VII. Later on Kreel led Scar Squadron to the planet Crait where the lightsaber was destroyed in a lightsaber duel with Skywalker.
Despite that, Kreel was able to repair the lightsaber and used it during his duel with Skywalker on Hubin.
